features: 【Durable & Sturdy Structure】The 8 tiers shoe rack is made of corrosion-resistant metal pipes, high-quality PP connectors, and waterproof non-woven fabric layers, which enables this shoe storage rack to load much heavier duty and more durable while using.

【Simple Versatility Shoe Storage Rack】This simple, lightweight space-saving shoe rack can be removable, You can remove one layer to fit boots, high heels. This rack is for shoes bags and toys, books, boxes, sundries and small accessories.
【 Easy installation in 10 mins】Special connector design allows you to assemble this rack freely, No tools are needed, simply assemble the unit by hand with provided parts, just enjoy free storage.

【Space-Saving Shoe Organiser】Overall size: 11”W x 11.8” D x 48” H, makes it an ideal storage solution for your cabinet, entryway, garage, and other storage areas to keep shoes or accessories well organized.

【1 year warranty】The high-end gray shoe rack conforms to any home style. KANAV offers 1-year of quality assurance and lifetime professional customer service. If missing parts or any other quality issues and problems, please contact us anytime, Wholeheartedly for your service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q1: Is it easy to install? Can a woman install it independently? A1: Ladies can install it independently, please check the installation instructions and installation video carefully before installation, if you have any questions, you can email the seller on Amazon platform, we will deal with it as soon as possible. Q2: Is this shoe rack sturdy? How much weight can it hold? A2: This shoe rack is supported by 4 parallel steel tubes in each tier and can support up to 50 lbs weight. Q3: Can I assemble the height according to my needs? A3: Yes, you can, because this shoe rack is assembled with various parts, you can decide the number of tiers according to your needs, and you can also decide the height of each tier freely. Q4: What if there are missing parts? A4: Please send an email to the seller on Amazon platform at the first time, we will deal with it in the fastest time, please don't worry.
A good mood starts at home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels unstable until it's put together than surprisingly sturdy
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this piece to add to our entry closet for shoes hats gloves umbrellas etc. It was annoying to put together but not difficult - just time consuming - the most annoying part was getting the plastic dividers to slide over the metal barsOnce those were all on it went right togetherVery sturdy after it's assembled and I wasn't sure it was going to be so when I opened it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was my wife's idea...
reviews.reviewText: The problem from her point of view was I've got too many pairs of running shoes, regular shoe, slippers, etc. that turn up here and there. Tried closet floor, too cluttered. I hated the mess myself. But after assembling this thing why I'm amazed at how simple it is and how it makes such good use of a tiny part of our room that you wouldn't use for anything anyway! Really, it's an ingenious solution. Not a lot of money either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdier than expected
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, great for those limited on space, holds a nice amount of shows. Even men’s size 12.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a compact lightweight and partitionable shelf!
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is very lightweight, and if fits in tight spaces - only a foot wide. I was able to partition it into 3 sections - a 3-level shelf for shoes (with no bottom plate), and two 2-level shelves for hats, etc. One of those is also with no bottom plate, but good enough as the wrapper canvas adds stability.I like the precise workmanship - everything fits well, fairly tight, so it won't fall apart if carried or held with some moderate weight in it. It looks decent too.I was able to fit two pairs of shoes into each slot, if placed 69 for each pair.Overall, I am pretty happy with this. Time will tell how well it holds.Assembly tips:It will take you at least 40 min to assemble.- Get a leather or marine or other tough glove for quicker and safe assembly.- I'd suggest putting tubes into all the canvas sleeves first - you'll be doing it much faster by the end, and save time on sliding the canvas, as it's more difficult to do when tight. Then insert the tubes in sleeves first and after that the free tubes (one side).- Pair the left and right holders in advance and set them all in the right direction, to avoid mixing up/down accidentally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Weak, not stable , time consuming
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know what I expected for this price but it looked much more better in picture ,But actually it is too weak , not stable , not durable seems , took at least my 2 hours to make and I got too nervous as you have to build it again if you make any mistake. Can be worth for price but I would buy something more expensive rather than spending my time and nerve .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to put together for a woman
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for a shoe rack by the door for everyone to use. I like that it is very sturdy once put together. I hate that it’s hard to put together. Took me 1 hour to put it together. Also. The quality of the metal pieces are cheap so when connecting them if you don’t connect them right or hammer them too hard you will change the shape of the metal and it won’t fit into the hole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful organizer. When I tripped over my shoes for the fifth time, I realized that something had to be done. I admittedly have a large foot (women’s size 12), and most racks are too narrow and too short. This shoe rack is sturdy, stable and roomy. Easy to assemble and unobtrusive in the corner of the room. Will definitely buy another one for my mom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and perfect size for small space. Quality is ok considering the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described not difficult to assemble but patience is needed.
